title: Looking for ADC/Support Coach
body:
Hi everyone! I've been stuck in a rut playing bot lane lately and I'm looking for a higher elo player to give me some coaching tips.

Currently I'm hovering back and forth between S3 and S2, aiming for Gold before the season ends.

Give me a shout if you think you can help out. My IGN is omgVandi.

-vandi

replies.body: Hey, I just added you if you want me to spectate a game or something. I'm plat and focus on both adc/support
My main role is bottom lane, I have played for over 3 years, and I have significant coaching experience! I added you in-game and look forward to working with you. :)
Im not that much higher than you on the ladder (s1), but id be down to spectate/lane and practice with you, just add me in game: SpareTheNoob
